name: Electron セキュリティ ベストプラクティス
description: ElectronにおけるCSP/contextIsolation/preload/IPCのベストプラクティスを短くまとめたガイド。

files.template:
# Electron Security Best Practices

- Use `contextIsolation: true`, `nodeIntegration: false`
- Expose minimal API via `preload` and `contextBridge`
- Prefer `ipcMain.handle`/`ipcRenderer.invoke` (request/response)
- Validate inputs on main process; never trust renderer
- Set CSP meta in HTML: `default-src 'self'; script-src 'self';`
- Disable `enableRemoteModule`; avoid unsafe-eval/inline scripts
- Use `shell.openExternal` safely (validate URLs)
- Keep Electron up-to-date; review advisories

Code samples: see `electron-preload-ipc-minimal` spike.
